mapper.insert: insert into mp_role (roleno, rolename, locked, description) values (#{roleno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
